plugins.name: ACCodeSnippetRepository
plugins.description: Synchronize code snippets with a git repository.

plugins.name: AdjustFontSize
plugins.description: Adjust font size with ⌘ + / ⌘ -

plugins.name: BBUDebuggerTuckAway
plugins.description: Auto-hide the debugger once you start typing in the source code editor.

plugins.name: CocoaPods
plugins.description: CocoaPods integration right in Xcode

plugins.name: ClangFormat
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in to to use clang-format from in Xcode and consistently format your code with Clang

plugins.name: XCommentWrap
plugins.description: XCommentWrap is a plugin for wrapping comments at 80 characters.

plugins.name: PluginConsole
plugins.description: Extension for standard Xcode console. Use it for log debug information from your plugin to Xcode console.

plugins.name: BBUncrustifyPlugin
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to uncrustify the source code opened in the editor

plugins.name: SCXcodeMinimap
plugins.description: SCXcodeMiniMap is a plugin that adds a source editor MiniMap to Xcode.

plugins.name: SCXcodeSwitchExpander
plugins.description: Xcode plugin that enables switch cases autocompletion

plugins.name: DerivedData Exterminator
plugins.description: Button for quickly deleting derived data. Makes Xcode happy.

plugins.name: OMColorSense
plugins.description: Xcode plugin that makes working with UIColor (and NSColor) more visual.

plugins.name: OMQuickHelp
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to integrate the Dash documentation viewer app

plugins.name: KSImageNamed
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in that provides autocomplete for imageNamed: calls

plugins.name: HOStringSense
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to make working with strings less "escaped"

plugins.name: XVim
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for Vim keybindings

plugins.name: Xcode_beginning_of_line
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to make HOME key jump to the first non-whitespace line of code

plugins.name: Lin
plugins.description: Shows completion for NSLocalizedString

plugins.name: XCFixin_FindFix
plugins.description: This fixin makes Xcode show all find options (such as "Ignore Case") in the find bar when it opens.

plugins.name: XCFixin_TabAcceptsCompletions
plugins.description: Upon pressing tab, this fixin makes Xcode accept the currently-highlighted completion suggestion in the popup list.

plugins.name: XCFixin_CustomizeWarningErrorHighlights
plugins.description: Customize the inline error/warning message highlight color. Useful if you want to be able to read your code when using a dark background color.

plugins.name: XCFixin_UserScripts
plugins.description: Reinstates some semblance of the Xcode 3.x User Scripts menu. See documentation in the XCFixin_UserScripts directory.

plugins.name: ShowInGithub
plugins.description: Open the related Github page of a source file directly form the Xcode editor code window.

plugins.name: Xprop
plugins.description: Exclude @property and @synthesize document items from the navigator menu.

plugins.name: OROpenInAppCode
plugins.description: Opens the current xcworkspace / xcproject in AppCode.

plugins.name: InstaCodesPlugin
plugins.description: This plug-in allows developers to post code fragments directly from Xcode IDE to Instacode - an Instagram for your code. It supports OS X 10.7 and higher + Xcode 4.x.

plugins.name: XcodeExplorer
plugins.description: This is a plugin project that allows you, as a developer, to explore the various events and notifications that Xcode4 emits during normal operations.

plugins.name: BTGisterPost-Xcode5
plugins.description: Xcode 5+ only. This plug-in allow developers to quickly post gist's to GitHub directly from XCode.It supports Xcode 5.x.

plugins.name: VVDocumenter-Xcode
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in which helps you write Javadoc style documents easier.

plugins.name: XFunnyEditor
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to display an image on the background of the editor

plugins.name: AJKExtendedOpening
plugins.description: Adds 'Show Project in Finder' and 'Open Project in Terminal' menu items and replaces the existing 'Open with External Editor' item.

plugins.name: JDPluginManager
plugins.description: This plugin makes it easy to install, update and remove them. It adds a new MenuItem Plugins in the Menu Bar of Xcode.

plugins.name: QuickLocalization
plugins.description: Xcode Plugin to Convert @"content" to NSLocalizedString(@"content", @"content")

plugins.name: XcodePlus Delete Line
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to plus extra feature － delete line, even mulit-lines

plugins.name: InjectionPlugin
plugins.description: Inject code changes directly into your running application.

plugins.name: XcodeColors
plugins.description: XcodeColors allows you to use colors in the Xcode debugging console. It's designed to aid in the debugging process.

plugins.name: FuzzyAutocomplete
plugins.description: Enables fuzzy matching in Xcode's autocomplete, using the 'Open Quickly' algorithm.

plugins.name: XcAddedMarkup
plugins.description: XcAddedMarkup is an Xcode plugin that adds a custom markup for hyperlinks and images inside the Xcode console and the Xcode source editor

plugins.name: XAlign
plugins.description: An amazing Xcode plugin to align regular code. It can align Xnything in any way you want.

plugins.name: XToDo
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to collect and list the `TODO`,`FIXME`,`???`,`!!!!`

plugins.name: Jumper
plugins.description: Allows to move cursor 10 lines up/down with alt + up/down arrows.

plugins.name: WarningLightsXcodePlugin
plugins.description: An Xcode plug-in that flashes your Philips Hue light bulbs different colours depending on the result of your build.

plugins.name: KFCocoaPodsPlugin
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for CocoaPods with pod commands/console output, user notifications & code completion.

plugins.name: Xcode_copy_line
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in to copy/cut the current line when there is no selected text

plugins.name: CComment
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for C Style Comment(uncomment) /**/

plugins.name: RRConstraintsPlugin
plugins.description: RRConstraintsPlugin is plugin for Xcode 5.1+ to improves workflow for constraints based layout by adding new features to Xcode Interface Builder.

plugins.name: WakaTime
plugins.description: Fully automatic time tracking.

plugins.name: Eero Xcode
plugins.description: Eero Programming Language support. Please restart Xcode after installing!

plugins.name: XcodeRefactoringPlus
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to extend the current refactoring function to the functionality similar in eclipse.

plugins.name: KPRunEverywhereXcodePlugin
plugins.description: Build and run apps across multiple iOS devices with one click.

plugins.name: Polychromatic
plugins.description: Coloring with significance. Gives properties, ivars, and local variables each a unique, dynamic color in Xcode's source editor.

plugins.name: SwipeGestureSwitcher
plugins.description: Simply turns the swipe-to-navigate-files gesture on/off in the source editor.

plugins.name: BlockJump
plugins.description: A plug-in let you jump between methods, or other items in the source editor.

plugins.name: RevealPlugin
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to integrate the Reveal App to your project automatic.

plugins.name: RSImageOptimPlugin
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to optimize images using ImageOptim.
